actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the construction of a certain memorial along the route of the Lewis and Clark Expedition in North Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a cooperative agreement with the Three Affiliated Tribes of the Fort Berthold Reservation for the construction and maintenance within the Fort Berthold Reservation in North Dakota of a memorial containing a plaque donated by the Lewis and Clark Trail Commission.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the construction of a certain memorial along the route of the Lewis and Clark Expedition in North Dakota.
